title: Choose your route to market
subtitle: Choose from the options below.
radio_button_subtitle1: Find out if suppliers are interested in bidding for your project, and can offer the products or services needed. If a supplier does not respond to an EoI sent from the buyer, they cannot bid for the opportunity later.
radio_button_subtitle2: Please note that if you initiate any pre-market engagement or start writing your requirements and then decide you don’t want to use the list of suppliers you created with this tool, you’ll have to close the project and restart from the beginning.
radio_button_subtitle3: Ask suppliers about the products and services they offer and the commercial terms needed to buy them.

form.question: What would you like to do next?

items.value: I want to close this event, and move to the next stage of the project
items.text: I want to close this event, and move to the next stage of the project

items.value: I also want to close the whole project
items.text: I also want to close the whole project
